titleStmt.title: A fragment of Njáls saga : AM 162 B κ fol : A digital edition

availability.p: Licence accepted by the editor Beeke Stegmann in a mail to Odd Einar Haugen 1 November 2015.

notesStmt.note: Produced as part of my master's thesis in collaboration with the project The Variance of Njáls saga at Háskóli Íslands.

msIdentifier.repository: The Árni Magnússon Institute for Icelandic Studies, Reykjavík, Iceland

projectDesc.p: This encoding follows the standard set out in The Menota handbook (version 2.0), at http://www.menota.org/HB_index.xml as of 2008-05-16.
The encoded text has numbered pagebreaks, and linebreaks according to the manuscript.
Proper names and personal names, including nicknames and patronyms, have been tagged.
Chapter numbers are supplied based on Íslenzk fornrit XII: Brennu-Njáls saga, Einar Ól. Sveinsson, 1971.

correction.p: This text has been transcribed directly from photographic colour facsimiles of the manuscript.

normalization.p: This text has been encoded on three levels: facsimile, diplomatic and normalized. The normalization is based on the scribe's own orthography.

interpretation.p: This text has not yet been annotated.
